projects.name: uatanks
projects.title: UATanks
projects.info: UATanks is a top-down game where you control a tank to defeat all other tanks to win. It was made in the Unity3D engine, and can be built for both [PC](https://github.com/nickc01/UATanks/releases), [web](https://nickc01.github.io/Online-Games/UATanks/), and more platforms in the future

projects.name: dungeon-escape
projects.title: Dungeon Escape
projects.info: Dungeon Escape is a top-down exploration game where your goal is to find the dungeon's exit without being killed by skeletons. The game was built using C++, with the SFML library being utilized for the graphics and input. The game also utilizes CMake, which allows the game to be built for multiple platforms and operating systems. I was able to get the game built for both [Windows and Linux](https://github.com/nickc01/Dungeon-Escape/releases)

projects.name: badland-battles
projects.title: Badland Battles
projects.info: Badland battles is a top-down shooting game where you play as a soldier in a desert. Your goal is to survive from a wave of enemy solders without getting shot down. This game utilizes advanced Unity3D features such as baked lighting, reflection probes, and inverse kinematics. It also is built for both [PC](https://github.com/nickc01/Badland-Battles/releases) and [web](https://nickc01.github.io/Online-Games/Badland%20Battles/)
